metadata.title: CVE-2023-35939 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 9.5.0 and prior to version 10.0.8, an incorrect rights check on aon a file accessible by an authenticated user (or not for certain actions),allows a threat actor to interact, modify, or see Dashboard data. Version10.0.8 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
